resources.string: Enter details about the credit card you want to use with Google Wallet.
Shop for all your favorite apps, games, and more on Google Play.
You can bill purchases directly to your %1$s account.
Go to Play store settings to enable password protection for added security.
Purchasing is fast, easy, and safe because your credit card is saved with Google Wallet. Your purchases are password protected.
Purchasing is fast, easy, and safe because your credit card is saved with Google Wallet. Go to Play store settings to enable password protection for added security.
Discover, MasterCard, Visa, and Visa Electron\nThe CVC is the last three digits of the number that appears on the back of your card in the signature bar.
American Express\nThe CVC is the four digits located on the front of the card, on the right side.
Adding a credit card will create a Google Wallet account for you. Privacy Policy.
Please enter your billing address to be stored in your Google account.
Your billing address will be stored in your Google account:
The following billing address will be stored in your Google account.

Google Play reviews now use Google+ so it\'s easier to see opinions from people you care about.\n\nNew reviews will be publicly linked to your Google+ profile. Your name on previous reviews now appears as \"A Google User.\"

Consider skipping this update and installing it later, when you have a Wi-Fi connection.

Can\'t give you a refund at this time.\n\nTry uninstalling later.
This app is very large. To avoid potential delays or extra data usage charges, use Wi-Fi only.
This app will start to download when Wi-Fi is available. It\'s too large to fetch over a mobile network.
This large app will continue downloading while Wi-Fi is available. If the Wi-Fi connection disappears, downloading will pause.

Read millions of books on the go

Explore the world’s largest selection of eBooks — including millions of free titles.

Try any eBook before you buy, and read anywhere with the Play Books app.

Your favorite magazines are right here on Google Play.

Pick up the latest issues or try out a free trial subscription. Read instantly with the Play Magazines app, even offline.

Keep your music online for free. Add up to 20,000 songs from your computer, and shop millions more on Google Play.

Listen to all your music with the Play Music app or on the web — no wires or syncing required.

Kick back and enjoy thousands of new releases and award-winning films.

Watch instantly on the web or in the Play Movies app on your Android phone or tablet.

Your game will be downloaded and installed in the background. In the meantime, enhance your experience with the Play Games app:

• Play games with your friends
• See what games they’re playing
• Discover new games
• Unlock and track achievements
• Compare scores with other players
